meanings.definition: A decision or judgment reached after consideration
meanings.sent1: The jury's verdict was that the defendant was guilty.
meanings.sent2: The judge announced the final verdict in the courtroom.
meanings.sent3: The verdict of the jury left everyone in the courtroom surprised.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the verdict of her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's verdict on the project was that it needed more work.

meanings.definition: A formal declaration or pronouncement of a decision or judgment
meanings.sent1: The official verdict of the court was read aloud.
meanings.sent2: The verdict of the judge was clear and concise.
meanings.sent3: The verdict of the magic mirror declared her the fairest of them all.
meanings.sent4: The verdict of the weather forecast was rain for the weekend.
meanings.sent5: The final verdict of the competition was eagerly awaited by all participants.
